message.msgstr: On this page, you may modify the ONU authentication-related parameters to authenticate the OLT. It will take effect after restarting.

You may modify the ONU authentication-related parameters to authenticate the OLT. It will take effect after restarting. Please do not change the password, it will effect the service if the password has been changed, thanks!
(You can input 0-10 characters, including alphanumeric, '-' and '_')
(You can restore configuration of this page to default by clicking this button)
You modify the authentication parameters successfully! Whether to restart ONU? Please login WEB network management after ONU restarting!
LOID is illegal! Please input basic Latin characters!
Please input basic Latin characters except
Error: The value you input is illegal, please try again!
Error: Set auth params failed! Please reboot device and try again!
